title: Once Upon a Prince
description: Who you want might not be who you need.Ember Coruscate is a carefree dragon wanting nothing more than to play and he has his sights set on Flame. But something changes after he has been kidnapped. Roar Sliger has wanted Ember for as long as he can remember, but what dragon would want a gargoyle for a mate? Marabell and Glenda are at it again, giving the pair what they need. Will Ember be dragon enough to realize there is more to life than a hot body and a pretty face? Can he get over the fact that Roar is a family friend and find the love they both deserve?
author: Jambrea Jo Jones
